page.title: 15SPORTS AND LEISURE.
page.content: {Peter}and{Robert}enjoy{fishing}in the {River Severn}below the Weir.There they meet grown-ups who belong to Angling Clubs.Most of the class go swimming in {Shrewsbury Baths}as often as they can afford it.Many parents are keen on playing{Bingo}at both the{Midland Red {Club}and the{Granada.}Most fathers enjoy gardening and{Rose}has her own patch where she grows vegetables.Many families go walking to local beauty spots including the town park-{The {Quarry.}In winter many fathers belong to{Darts,Snooker}and{Domino}teams in local pubs and workingmen's clubs.Some of these clubs also organise{pigeon {races}and there are special clubs for {Boxing,Badminton}and{Squash.}There are Winter leagues for{Football,Hockey}and {Netball}and Summer leagues for{Tennis, {Cricket,Rounders}and{Bowls}(Crown Green).Rowing and Boating are popular.
